content.description: Stand start on crimps near the left end of the boulder. Move your right hand up to a mini jug, then your left hand to a sloper on the arete. Work your feet up and then move your right hand up to another jug up left over the top of the arete. Move right to jugs and then mantel and top out.
content.location: 8 feet left of Spring Thing just before the boulder curves around to a small overhang and Leafpeepers Hate Spring.

content.description: Start on the starting holds for Wellspring and then traverse over to the right to finish on Spring Thing.
content.location: On the Spring Sliding boulder, starts as for Wellspring and traverse into Spring Thing to top out.

content.description: Center-right on the main face of the Spring Sliding boulder. Start on the crack then move up to a right-hand jug on the crack line. After that move your left hand to a jug and then top out and mantle.
content.location: Center-right on the main face, stand starts in good diagonal crack.

content.description: 6 feet to the right of Spring Thing on the arete. Starts on the same ledge as Sprung. Use jugs around the arete and go straight up.
content.location: To the right of Spring Thing on the arete facing the Red Eft boulder and the trail.

content.description: Start on Spring Chicken, follow to the arete, and then go around the corner traversing - stay low. Use the start holds on Spring Thing, continue traversing left on thin crimps and bad feet, then follow Wellspring up to top out.
content.location: Start on far right of the Spring Sliding boulder and finish at the far left corner on Wellspring.

content.description: Sit start on the right side of the Spring Sliding boulder on a horn. Heel hook the lip and continue to slap up it to the arete. Finish as for Spring Roll.
content.location: Sit starts on the right side of the boulder facing the Red Eft boulder. Continues up the lip to the arete.

content.description: Start with your left hand on a side-pull rail and your right hand on the arete, heel hook your right foot high around the arete and put your left foot on a small slippery knob. Match on a side-pull rail, bump left to a side-pull jug, and move your right hand up to a jug to mantel around the left side of the arete and top out.
content.location: Stand starts on the far left overhung side of the Spring Sliding boulder (around the corner from Wellspring).

content.description: Fun route, the 2nd move is the crux. Start 3 feet to the left of Spring Thing on the rail. Move up left to a triangle-shaped 1/4 pad crimp, work your feet up, and then move your right hand to a nice slot. After that, grab the top and mantle at the scoop.
content.location: In between WellSpring and Spring Thing on the Spring Sliding boulder.

content.description: 50 yards directly behind the Red Eft Boulder.  Fun easy and moderate problems.  Slide down the backside.
